roleset.name: reject, refuse to acknowledge or pay
roleset.note: REPUDIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'repudiate' based on sentences in wsj. VN class judgment-33. (from repudiate.01-v)

role.descr: thing rejected or refused as untrue

example.name: I think that's right
example.text: After that, the buyers may repudiate the rates paid by the former thrifts.
example.arg: the rates paid by the former thrifts
